installer,linux arm,py3.10,brp:
'# download via button above -OR- following line' + brprompt + 'curl "https://vergil.chemistry.gatech.edu/psicode-download/Psi4conda-1.9.1-py310-Linux-aarch64.sh" -o Psi4conda-1.9.1-py310-Linux-aarch64.sh --keepalive-time 2' + brprompt + 'bash Psi4conda-1.9.1-py310-Linux-aarch64.sh -b -p $HOME/psi4conda' + bash + 'echo $\'. $HOME/psi4conda/etc/profile.d/conda.sh\\nconda activate\' >> ~/.bashrc' + tcsh + 'echo "source $HOME/psi4conda/etc/profile.d/conda.csh\\nconda activate" >> ~/.tcshrc' + '
# log out, log back in so conda and psi4 in path' + brprompt + 'psi4 --test'

'# download via button above -OR- following line' + brprompt + 'curl "https://vergil.chemistry.gatech.edu/psicode-download/Psi4conda-1.10-py310-Linux-aarch64.sh" -o Psi4conda-1.10-py310-Linux-aarch64.sh --keepalive-time 2' + brprompt + 'bash Psi4conda-1.10-py310-Linux-aarch64.sh -b -p $HOME/psi4conda' + bash + 'echo $\'. $HOME/psi4conda/etc/profile.d/conda.sh\\nconda activate\' >> ~/.bashrc' + tcsh + 'echo "source $HOME/psi4conda/etc/profile.d/conda.csh\\nconda activate" >> ~/.tcshrc' + '
# log out, log back in so conda and psi4 in path' + brprompt + 'psi4 --test'

source,linux arm,py3.10,brn:
pprompt + 'git clone https://github.com/psi4/psi4.git && cd psi4' +
                    brprompt + 'eval $(conda/psi4-path-advisor.py env --python 3.10 --name p4dev --disable addons docs)' +
                    brprompt + 'eval $(conda/psi4-path-advisor.py cmake)' +
                    brprompt + 'eval $(objdir_p4dev/stage/bin/psi4 --psiapi)' +
                    brprompt + 'psi4 --test' +
                    brprompt + '# run `conda/psi4-path-advisor.py -h` for guide and options' +
                    brprompt + '# -or- see top-level CMakeLists.txt for generic (non-conda) guide'+ brprompt + '# psi4-path-advisor.py not tested for this architecture, but all necessary conda packages are available'
